text: Jose Carlos Ruiz Gonzalez (born November 4, 1971 in Los Realejos, Tenerife, Canary Islands) is a judo athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and is a B2 type athlete. He competed in judo at the 2000 Summer Paralympics and he won third place in the men's Up to 60 kg group. == References == Category:Spanish judoka Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from the Canary Islands Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: José Carlos Ruiz González
